item.name: Dagger
item.description: We sell the most deadly of daggers, a bargain at only %dgp each.

item.name: Mace
item.description: These maces have a hardened shaft and a 5 lb head fairly priced at %dgp.

item.name: Sling
item.description: Our slings are made from only the finest guy and leather. 'Tis yours for %dgp.

item.name: Axe
item.description: Notice the fine workmanship on this axe, you'll agree %dgp is a good price.

item.name: Bow
item.description: Our bows are made of finest yew, and the arrows willow, a steal at %dgp.

item.name: Sword
item.description: The fine work on these swords will be the dread of thy foes, for %dgp.

item.name: 2H Sword
item.description: 2 handed swords made by Blackbeard the smith are the finest in the world, your for %dgp.

item.name: Axe +2
item.description: Magically hardened Axes make great weapons for %dgp each.

item.name: Bow +2
item.description: A bow with magically enhancements mean you cannot miss; a must and only %dgp.

item.name: Sword +2
item.description: This magical sword blade is hardened with a steel core for %dgp.

item.name: Melee Gloves
item.description: Pugilist melee gloves such as these are rare indeed. I will part with one for %dgp.

item.name: Axe +4
item.description: Magically hardened Axes make great weapons for %dgp each.

item.name: Bow +4
item.description: A bow with magically enhancements mean you cannot miss; a must and only %dgp.

item.name: Sword +4
item.description: This magical sword blade is hardened with a steel core for %dgp.

item.name: Cloth
item.description: Cloth Armour is good for a tight budget, Fairly priced at %dgp.

item.name: Leather
item.description: Leather Armour is both supple and strong, and costs a mere %dgp. A Bargain!

item.name: Chain Mail
item.description: Chail Mail is the armour used by more warriors than all others. Ours costs %dgp.

item.name: Plate Mail
item.description: Full Plate armour is the ultimate in non-magical armour. Get yours for %dgp.

item.name: Chain +2
item.description: Magic Armour is rare and expensive. This chain sells for %dgp.

item.name: Plate +2
item.description: Magic Plate Armour is the best known protection. Only we have it. Cost: %dgp.

%s says: Have you ever heard of Ambrosia?
%s says: Dawn is a city of myths and magic. The conjunction of the moons finds link.
%s says: Go to Fawn, and find something invokes the Snake.
%s says: None return or so I'm told from the pool dark and cold.
%s says: Fountains fair. fountains foul. All are found in Dungeons bowel..
%s says: Shrines of knowledge, shrines of strength, are all but lost into the brink.
%s says: Seek ye out the Lord of Time and the one way is a sure find!

item.name: Torches
item.description: I can give ya 5 long lasting Torches for a mere 30gp.

item.name: Magic Gems
item.description: I've got magical mapping Gems, for only 75gp.

item.name: Magic Keys
item.description: Magical Keys, 1 use each, a fair price at 50gp.

item.name: Powder
item.description: Negate time for opponents using a powder, for 90gp each.

%s says: You'll learn of marks and playing cards and hidden holy shrines.
%s says: Of marks there are but four - Fire, Force, Snake, King.
%s says: Learn their use in Devil Guard or death you'll surely bring.
%s says: Shrines there are but four to which you go and pray.
%s says: Their uses are innumberable and clues throughout I say.
%s says: Suits do number four, called Sol, Moons, Death, and Love.
%s says: Unto the Montors thou must go for guidance from above.
%s says: To aid thee in thy cryptic search, to dungeons thou must fare.
%s says: There seek out the Lord of Time to help you if he cares.
